positionDate.description: Initial position date with corporate action effects applied.

eventUpdateDate.description: Date the application of the events in custody will be made by (used in batch this day).

clearingMemberIdentificationId.description: Clearing Member identifier provided by A5X

clearingMemberIdentificationCategory.$comment: Only categories (Intermediário Full), (Participante de Liquidação), and (Intermediário Light) are allowed to include an account. Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode.

participantIdentificationCategory.$comment: Only categories (Intermediário Full), (Participante de Liquidação), and (Intermediário Light) are allowed to include an account. Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode.

accountIdentification.description: Account identifier defined by the participant

tickerSymbol.description: Letters that identify stocks traded on stock exchange

financialInstrumentIdentificationExchang.description: Identifier code of the exchange where the instrument is listed

market.description: Market type - second level of market classification in post-trading process
market.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalMarketCode

corporateActionType.description: Contains the description of the corporate action to be applied
corporateActionType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCorporateActionsTypeCode

corporateActionIdentification.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCorporateActionCode

afterApplyingCorporateActionsIsin.description: International Securities Identification Number - Standardized international code for unique identification of financial instruments

afterApplyingCorporateActionsTickerSymbo.$comment: Ticker Symbol after applying corporate actions.

afterApplyingCorporateActionsUnderlyingI.description: Underlying ISIN after applying corporate actions

afterApplyingCorporateActionsExercisePri.description: Exercise Price after applying corporate actions
